visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart title: 'Monthly Average Rainfall'; Axes and labels styling: Use a dark blue color for the title, and set the font size of the x-axis labels to 12px; Data series: The series should be named 'Rainfall' and contain the provided data; Custom colors: Use a gradient from light blue to dark blue for the series; Additional configurations: Set the chart background to a light gray color, and include a legend with the series name.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart's background is set to a light gray color, and the title is styled with a dark blue color and a font size of 18px. The x-axis labels are styled with a font size of 12px. The data series is named 'Rainfall' and includes the monthly rainfall data. The series color is a gradient from light blue to dark blue. The chart also includes a legend that displays the series name. Additionally, the navigation buttons are styled with a blue stroke color.
